title: HOUR 2 - Mayfield, Mavericks, Lakers
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Mayfield, Mavericks, Lakers
description:
Update on the Baker Mayfield-Browns situation

There are some areas the Mavericks need to improve on and Luka Doncic needs to take better care of his body

Doc Rivers would be a good fit for the Lakers


Guest: Quentin Richardson

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
